title: 58. If you do not grant a user named Bob permission to access a Cloud Storage bucket, but then use an ACL to grant access to an object inside that bucket to Bob, what will happen?
alternatives: A. Bob will be able to access all of the objects inside the bucket because he was granted access to at least one object in the bucket.
B. Bob will be able to access the object because bucket and object ACLs are independent of each other.
C. Bob will not be able to access the object because he does not have access to the bucket.
D. It is not possible to grant access to an object when it is inside a bucket for which a user does not have access.
